name: No Time Like The Present
description:
NO TIME LIKE THE PRESENT

WASD to move
Arrow Keys to dig
Space to jump
Enter to go through intro.

Collect gems and progress through the infinite cave to attempt to get as close to the present as possible,
or see how far you can go.

avoid enemies and press R to restart if you need to.

This was made for the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 game jam.

the theme was "present".

this was my first game jam, as well as my first attempt at procedural generation.
I hope you enjoy :)

credit for the house art at start:
GrafxKid - https://opengameart.org/content/choco-prairies-gb-pack
